Grouped_Utterances: It’s been a mixed bag, honestly. I went to a film event, but I felt really anxious.   I struggled to talk to anyone. I felt like I was just standing there, watching.   I think it’s just my shyness. I keep thinking no one will want to talk to me.   I was disappointed in myself. I wanted to connect but didn’t know how.   I’ve been more aware of my anxiety, but I still feel overwhelmed sometimes.
It’s good! We’ve been talking more regularly since I moved.   I still struggle with how my mom reacts to things. She tends to be critical.
I usually just try to distract myself with movies or music.
Mindfulness can help ground you in the present moment. Would you be open to trying a simple breathing exercise now?
As we wrap up, let’s set a goal for next week. How about practicing that breathing exercise daily?   Fantastic! And perhaps write down a few conversation starters for your next outing?
